Welcome to My World!

Hey there! Welcome to my corner of the internet where I share my journey and experiences in the world of software development.

About Me

I'm a curious soul with a knack for solving problems and a passion for coding. From tinkering with machinery to diving deep into code, I've always had a hunger for understanding how things work.

My Path

My journey in the tech world started with a certification as Data Processing Technician many years ago, but it wasn't until recently that I rediscovered my passion for coding. In between, I honed my problem-solving skills in the realms of marine engineering as an Officer in Charge of Engineering Watch and industrial machinery as a Millwright Mechanic.

What Makes Me Tick

I thrive on challenges and love collaborating with others to find creative solutions. Whether it's debugging a tricky piece of code or troubleshooting complex machinery, I'm always up for the challenge.

Skills & Expertise

I've picked up a few tricks along the way:

  • Problem-Solving: I love diving into complex problems and finding elegant solutions.
  • Adaptability: From maritime machinery to web development, I'm comfortable jumping into new environments.
  • Team Player: Collaboration is key in any project, and I bring a positive attitude and strong communication skills to the table.
  • Efficiency Junkie: I'm always looking for ways to streamline processes and make things run smoother.
  • Tech Toolbox: I'm comfortable working with languages like Ruby, Python, and JavaScript, and I'm knowledgeable in frameworks like Ruby on Rails and Sinatra.

If you'd like to connect, collaborate, or just chat about code:

Feel free to reach out!
